price: Nokorε sε wͻn a wͻdii wͻn anim kan no kaa saa ara, na deε wͻnyaeε no ho amma mfasoᴐ amma wͻn.
arabic: قَدۡ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qad qālahā alladhīna min qablihim famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
